scripts.gen:danfe: npm run build && node -e "const fs=require('fs');(async()=>{const m=await import('./dist/index.js');const xmlPath=process.env.XML||'exemplos/50251123341634000103550010000212371597662542.xml';const outPath=process.env.OUT||'exemplos/DANFe-teste.pdf';const xml=fs.readFileSync(xmlPath,'utf8');const pdf=await m.DANFe({xml});fs.writeFileSync(outPath,Buffer.from(pdf));console.log('Gerado:',outPath);})().catch(e=>{console.error(e);process.exit(1);});"
